name: Ascending Amphibians
description:
Ascending amphibians is a small arcade style game about getting as high as you can before the timer runs out! Eat flys while ascending to gain more time and make sure to aim correctly or you may fall down to the bottom!

Click and hold the mouse to aim and release to jump.

If you click the left mouse button while going through a platform you can do a super jump! Do this to gain a LOT of height
